name: Barian Battlemorph! The Barians' White Shield
text:
You can only use this Skill's second and third effects once per turn.
1: You can only Normal or Special Summon "Star Seraph" monsters (excluding Special Summons from the Extra Deck). Monsters on your field that include “Number 102" in the original card name can attack twice in each Battle Phase.
2: During your Main Phase, play "Star Seraph" monsters, 1 each from your Deck and hand to your field in face-down Defense Position. (Its battle position can be changed.)
3: If there is a card on your opponent's field, send 1 monster from your field to the Graveyard. Barian Battlemorph! Regain your true form! Play 1 "Star Seraph" monster from your Deck to your field in face-down Defense Position. (Its battle position can be changed.) Then, add 1 "Rank-Up-Magic Barian's Force" from outside of your Deck to your hand.
